casebody.data:
SLOAN FINANCIAL, et al.
v.
BECKETT. No. 514A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 17, 2004. E.D. Gaskins, Jr., Michael J. Tadych, Raleigh, Richard H. Block, New York, NY, for Justice Beckett and Dorika Mamboleo. LeAnn Nease Brown, Chapel Hill, Mark Fox Evens, Pro Hac Vice, William B. Kirk, Jr., Charlotte, Mary Margaret Utterback, Washington, DC, for Sloan Financial Group, Inc. et al, and Maceo K. Sloan. Henry W. Jones, Hope Derby Carmichael, Paul T. Flick, Raleigh, Brigida Benitez, Pro Hac Vice, Anne Harkavy, Pro Hac Vice, Washington, DC, for New Africa Opportunity Fund, L.P. d/b/a ZM Africa Investment Fund, L.P.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of February 2004 by David R. Lagasse for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of February 2004."
